name: maheidem-plugins
description: Personal Claude Code plugins by maheidem - Windows-compatible versions and custom tools

plugins.name: ralph-loop-mac
plugins.description: Mac-compatible Ralph Loop - Bash implementation for iterative AI development loops (Ralph Wiggum technique). v2.2.0: Fixed start-loop execution, pipefail, timeout.

plugins.name: ralph-loop-windows
plugins.description: Windows-compatible Ralph Loop - PowerShell implementation for iterative AI development loops (Ralph Wiggum technique). v2.1.0: Stuck detection warns when no file changes.

plugins.name: meeting
plugins.description: Self-contained meeting transcription and summarization using Whisper AI. Interactive guided mode, multiple output formats, speaker diarization, and AI-powered summaries.

plugins.name: plugin-forge
plugins.description: Forge new plugins from session reflections or from scratch. 6-phase workflow: intent clarification, marketplace setup, conflict detection, plugin planning, generation, and optional git commit/push.

plugins.name: agentic-mode
plugins.description: Force delegation to specialized agents by blocking direct tool use (Edit, Write, Bash, NotebookEdit) in main session. Subagents have full access. Per-project config via .claude/agentic-mode.local.md.
